MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The blackguard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 33, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:
1st level (4 slots): command, protection from evil and good, thunderous smite
2nd level (3 slots): branding smite, find steed
3rd level (2 slots): blinding smite, dispel magic

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.

MonsterAction.Name: Glaive
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the tar get can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
